p: The current study took place in the spring and summer of 2018 in the city of Sarab, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran (Location: 37°56′27″N and 47°32′12″E; altitude: 1,750 m). The first sampling started 30 days after the onset of the vegetative growth, in spring. All samplings were randomly selected from ten H. persicum plants. The harvest was done at different developmental stages (Figure 1). Each sampling was repeated three times, and sample's weight was 1 kg per replication. The samples were dried in a shade at room temperature (25°C).
